Blacknightmare:

Blacknightmare was taken by surprice and when she felt Orchestra's 
kiss all around her dissapeared. She didn't like that that ended...  
And she hugged Orchestra as if she didn't like that he left her

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Orchestra/Skullgrin::
> 
>       Orchestra stopped and landed before he got farther away, and 
put
> Blacknightmare down.
> 
>         "But...." he didn't know what to say.  He had grown a small 
fondness
> of this bot.
> 
>          He sighed.
> 
>           "Well, I guess this is my chance to be a part of things," 
he said,
> sighing.
> 
>             He slowly hovered up, then slowly took off, but 
stopped, went
> back and landed again in front of Blacknightmare.  He was silent 
for a
> moment.
> 
>              "Well, I came back to, uh, say goodbye," He said, then 
he
> paused.
> 
>              He was about to leave, but not yet.  He wished she 
could come.
> Well, before he went, he had to do something.  So, he went up to 
her,
> grabbed her, and started kissing her.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>           Skullgrin turned around and drew his metal rending Vibro 
Sword,
> and swung it as if to bat away Hot Rod.
